description:
Aspose.Pdf for .NET is a PDF document creation and manipulation component that enables your .NET applications to read, write and manipulate existing PDF documents without using Adobe Acrobat. It also allows you to create forms and manage form fields embedded in a PDF document. This component is written in managed C# and it allows developers to add PDF creation and manipulation functionality to their Microsoft .NET applications (WinForms, ASP.NET and .NET Compact Framework).
        Aspose.Pdf for .NET is affordable and offers an incredible wealth of features including PDF compression options; table creation and manipulation; support for graph objects; extensive hyperlink functionality; extended security controls; custom font handling; integration with data sources; add or remove bookmarks; create table of contents; add, update, delete attachments and annotations; import or export PDF form data; add, replace or remove text and images; split, concatenate, extract or inset pages; transform pages to image; print PDF documents and much more.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements and bug fixes as detailed below:
Features
PDFNET-42750 Add Tooltip to Text inside PDF file
PDFNET-38709 VerticalAlignment for FloatingBox contents
PDFNET-38580 VerticalAlignmentType support Row object
PDFNET-43056 Add feature to hide the page numbers in table of contents tree

Enhancements
PDFNET-41118 Searchable PDF issue

Bugs
PDFNET-35792 Storing PDF document into stream is too slow in batch operation
PDFNET-35851 Text Segments from Textfragment Absorber not in Correct Position
PDFNET-37346 PDF to PNG: text spacing is issue in resultant image
PDFNET-38237 PDF to TIFF - Conversion is taking too much time
PDFNET-38691 PDF to TIFF - Character spacing issue in resultant file
PDFNET-38886 Extracted Signature Images are in Black and White
PDFNET-39562 PDF to PNG: incorrect rendering of text
PDFNET-39671 PDF to PDF/A - huge memory consumption during conversion
PDFNET-40734 PDF to TIFF - Text is garbled in resultant file
PDFNET-40853 Some text from string array is not redacting
PDFNET-41659 Replacing Text Causes Text to Go Offscreen
PDFNET-41810 PDF to PDF/A_1b - Text is garbled in resultant file
PDFNET-42482 Incorrect positioning of characters when saving PDF as HTML
PDFNET-42770 Incorect TextStamp rendering
PDFNET-42785 When PDF converted to PDF_A_1B, a blue color on image is different.
PDFNET-42897 PDF to DOCX - Content is missing in the resultant file
PDFNET-42971 Incorrect character position when saving as HTML
PDFNET-43107 Images are not showing when HTML is added through HtmlFragment
PDFNET-43216 PDF to TIFF - API is taking more time than expected
PDFNET-43256 All spaces are removed from the text and all lines ends with "ti"
PDFNET-43620 The accented text has been clipped if placed in the first line of TextFragment text.
PDFNET-43340 Not possible to create radio buttons
PDFNET-43366 NullReferenceException occurred on getting form fields
PDFNET-43414 When add an image from embedded resource in WPF, then on Save document, GDI+ exception occurs.
PDFNET-43419 When adding a footnote to the table cell, it appears two times.
PDFNET-43459 Text is missing when saving PDF as HTML
PDFNET-43486 Null pointer exception occurs when calling flatten
PDFNET-43511 Text Justification as FullJustify is not working in FoatingBox
summary: Aspose.Pdf for .NET is an amazing component which provides the feature to create and manipulate PDF documents.
title: Aspose.Pdf for .NET
